name: Melissa Bonny
description:
'''Melissa Bonny''' (born 23 January 1993) is a Swiss [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]] singer best known as the founder and vocalist of [[Ad Infinitum (Swiss band)|Ad Infinitum]]. She is also the vocalist of The Dark Side of the Moon and former vocalist of Evenmore and Rage of Light. She gained some popularity by recording music and touring with bands such as [[Kamelot]], [[Feuerschwanz]], Rock Meets Classic and more.

Bonny has a [[mezzo-soprano]] voice. She also uses [[Death growl|guttural]] singing, to which she switches within songs.
